entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 04:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
